Best game for hackers. You cant get banned while using free public cheats. 10/10
Gran juego, lo recomiendo pero no te lo instales si tienes pensado no gastar dinero xd

Not a bad game, but not particularly addictive.

This game is taking a step in the right direction. 
Its has good gameplay mechanics and is overall fun.
But lets not speak of comp,
Full of smurfs who go 21-5 and hackers.
A good comp game lets say faceit, has near to no hackers, and smurf are rare. There anti-cheat software is better than anything Steam did until now.
This game dosent give a fuck. Steam is just throwing out updates to the community to mask the fact, that there only continuing this game (that was made in 2011) because of the money.
They could of have made a new game without a doubt. Steam has so much profit form CS. But there heading the same way as Bethesda with just countinuing  this game just to milk the fuck out of it.
Soy muy bueno en esto de los juegos de disparos

Fedt spil. Ganske enkelt og ligetil. Spillet kan dog blive lidt for enkelt til tider. Jeg savner mulighed for at designe sine egne våben, flere baner og hurtigere tjente XP. Alt i alt et super køb til prisen!
This game is the definition of depresion
В целом играбельно. С праймом становиться меньше читеров, их очень много на званиях выше Биг Стара. Рекомендую купить =)
